title: Update Programs section tagline to Sanskrit text

requirements.summary: Replace ProgramsSection tagline with Sanskrit text 'धर्मो रक्षति रक्षितः'
acceptanceCriteria: The ProgramsSection component displays 'धर्मो रक्षति रक्षितः' instead of 'Diverse initiatives dedicated to preserving tradition, spreading knowledge, and serving the community'
The Sanskrit text is properly rendered with correct UTF-8 encoding
The text styling and layout remain consistent with the existing design

file_operations.description: Update the tagline text from 'Diverse initiatives dedicated to preserving tradition, spreading knowledge, and serving the community' to 'धर्मो रक्षति रक्षितः'. Ensure the Sanskrit text uses proper UTF-8 encoding and maintains the existing text styling and layout.
